title: Waterflood Performance Review
description: A reservoir engineer reviews the performance of a waterflood project to ensure it is improving oil recovery as expected.

tasks.description: Generate a Hall Plot for a specific injection well to assess its performance.
tasks.expected_outcome: A Hall Plot is correctly generated, showing a potential plugging issue.

tasks.description: Analyze the production response of offset producing wells to the water injection.
tasks.expected_outcome: The analysis shows a delayed and weaker than expected production response.

tasks.description: Recommend a workover on the injection well to acidize the formation and improve injectivity.
tasks.expected_outcome: A workover recommendation with a clear justification is created.
